SELECT COUNT(device_id), device_type FROM smart_devices GROUP BY device_type;
SELECT user_preferences.user_id, COUNT(smart_devices.device_id) FROM user_preferences LEFT JOIN smart_devices ON user_preferences.user_id = smart_devices.user_id GROUP BY user_preferences.user_id;

SELECT device_type, COUNT(device_id) FROM smart_devices GROUP BY device_type HAVING COUNT(device_id) > 2;

SELECT user_preferences.user_id, COUNT(smart_devices.device_id) AS num_devices FROM user_preferences LEFT JOIN smart_devices ON user_preferences.user_id = smart_devices.user_id GROUP BY user_preferences.user_id ORDER BY num_devices DESC;

SELECT device_type, AVG(device_id) FROM smart_devices WHERE status = TRUE GROUP BY device_type;
